name: com.jfuzz.laxr
description:
LAXR is the Lazarsfeld apparatus for XR. 
Named from Paul Lazarsfeld --> https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Lazarsfeld
He is credited for being one of the founders of the modern day survey tool. I need some survey tools that work on current XR frameworks and I work in Unity so here we be!

samples.description: Code to get you off and running
